text: The 1983–84 Idaho Vandals men's basketball team represented the University of Idaho during the 1983–84 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. Members of the Big Sky Conference, the Vandals were led by first-year head coach Bill Trumbo and played their home games on campus at the Kibbie Dome in Moscow, Idaho. The Vandals were overall in the regular season and in conference play; the conference tournament was expanded this year to include all eight teams. The quarterfinals were at campus sites on Tuesday, and Idaho fell to league champion ==Roster== : ==Postseason result== |- !colspan=5 style=| Big Sky Tournament ==References== ==External links== *Sports Reference – Idaho Vandals: 1983–84 basketball season *Gem of the Mountains: 1984 University of Idaho yearbook – 1983–84 basketball season *Idaho Argonaut – student newspaper – 1984 editions Category:Idaho Vandals men's basketball seasons Idaho Idaho
title: 1983–84 Idaho Vandals men's basketball team
